outcome: /JUDGMENT IN CC 1117/2012 of J.M.F.C.,CHAVAKKAD CRIME NO. 493/2009 OF VADANAPPILLY POLICE STATION, TRISSUR PETITIONER (S) /ACCUSED: MUHAMMED MANSOOR, AGED 31 YEARS $/O.ABDUL RAHIMAN, PANIKKAVEETTIL HO
full_text: oe Pap ae ops Sea 2014/KER/213 IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR.JUSTICE HARUN-UL-RASHID THURSDAY, THE 2ND DAY OF JANUARY 2014/12TH POUSHA, 1935 Cr1.MC.No. 26 of 2014 () AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CC 1117/2012 of J.M.F.C.,CHAVAKKAD CRIME NO. 493/2009 OF VADANAPPILLY POLICE STATION, TRISSUR PETITIONER (S) /ACCUSED: MUHAMMED MANSOOR, AGED 31 YEARS $/O.ABDUL RAHIMAN, PANIKKAVEETTIL HOUSE, PATTILANGADY VADANAPPILLY, THRISSUR DISTRICT. BY ADVS.SRI.S.U.NAZAR SRI .MANSOOR.B.H. COMPLAINANT (S) /RESPONDENT: THE STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE SUB INSPECTOR OF POLICE VADANAPPILLY POLICE STATION THRISSUR DISTRICT THROUGH THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM - 682 031. BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SMT.S.HYMA THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 02-01-2014, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: oe Pap ae ops Sea 2014/KER/213 Cr1l.MC.No. 26 of 2014 () APPENDIX PETITIONER(S)' EXHIBITS ANNEXURE-A1 : THE CERTIFIED COPY OF THE CHARGE PENDING AGAINST THE PETITIONER IN CRIME NO.493/2009 OF VADANAPPILLY POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE-A2: THE CERTIFIED COPY OF THE JUDGEMENT IN C.C.NO.1269/2009 OF THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT, CHAVAKKAD. RESPONDENT (S)' EXHIBITS : NIL /TRUE COPY/ P. A. TO JUDGE Pn pe HARUN-UL-RASHID, J. 201VKER/213 Dated this the 2 day of January, 2014 ORDER Petitioner is the 3" accused in Crime No.493/2009 of Vadanappilly Police Station pending as L.P.No.70/2013 in C.C.No.1117/2012 on the file of Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Chavakkad. The offences alleged are punishable under Sections 341, 323, 324, 452, 427 read with Section 34 of IPC. 2. There are altogether three accused in the case. Accused Nos.1 and 2 faced trial and were acquitted in C.C.No.1269/2009. A copy of the judgment dated 29.09.2012 is produced as Annexure A2. The learned Magistrate found that the material witnesses failed to support the prosecution case about the involvement of the accused in the occurrence. The learned Prosecutor has justifiably given up the remaining witnesses. The court therefore found that, the prosecution failed to prove the guilty of the accused persons and they were found not guilty. In the facts and circumstances, no purpose will be served by prosecuting the petitioner. Hence, the Crl.M.C is allowed. All further proceedings in Crime No.493/2009 of Vadanappilly Police Station pending as L.P.No.70/2013 in C.C.No.1117/2012 on the file of Judicial First Class Magistrate Court, Chavakkad is quashed. Sd/- ay HARUN-UL-RASHID, JUDGE.
